useCase.name: Request Inventory List
useCase.description: Allows the Manager to request and view the inventory list.

successEndConditions.condition: The inventory list is successfully displayed to the Manager.

useCase.trigger: The Manager requests the inventory list.

mainSequence.step: Management Interface retrieves the inventory data.
Inventory Management Module queries the inventory list from the Database.
Database sends the inventory list data.
Inventory Management Module returns the inventory list to the Management Interface.
Management Interface displays the inventory list to the Manager.
